articles.title: Second Meeting of Security Personnel of KPA Held
articles.content:
Second Meeting of Security Personnel of KPA Held
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- There took place at April 25 House of Culture the second meeting of security personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 It was guided by Supreme Commander of the KPA Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song and Jo Kyong Chol and other commanding officers of the armed forces organs, and political commissars of all services and army corps and security personnel of the ground, naval and air and anti-air forces and strategic rocket force, military academies at different levels and other organs of the armed forces.
					
					 The venue of the meeting was pervaded with profound reverence and gratitude to Kim Jong Un, who made sure that the meeting was held, always paying deep attention to the security work in the KPA, and sent the participants in the meeting a letter "Let's further improve and strengthen the security work in the People's Army as required by the period of historic turn in accomplishing the Juche cause of revolution".
					
					 Vice Marshal of the KPA Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA,  made an opening address to be followed by a report delivered by Col. General of the KPA Jo Kyong Chol.
					
					 The reporter recalled that President Kim Il Sung provided the Juche-based idea of security work in the army and precious tradition in the crucible of the great anti-Japanese war, adding that after the liberation of the country he set up a security organ of the People's Army in the early period of building modern regular armed forces and clearly indicated the way to be followed by it in every period and at every stage of the development of revolution and wisely led it.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il convened a meeting of security personnel of the KPA in October 1993, the first of its kind in the army-building history, and sent a historic letter to the participants in the meeting, providing the security personnel with an ever-victorious treasured sword and always leading them to do their job as required by the idea and intention of the party.
					
					 The great Generalissimos' idea of Juche-oriented security work in the KPA and feats performed by them in it have been creditably carried forward and developed on a new higher level under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, the reporter noted, and continued:
					
					 The KPA security organ has carried forward the tradition of devotedly defending the leader thanks to the trust and loving care of the supreme commander, thus developing to be a core unit firmly protecting the safety of the headquarters of the revolution at all places and times.
					
					 The KPA security personnel have grown strongest in thinking and faith who advance along the road indicated by the party only and to be stalwart Songun revolutionary soldiers who share will, breath and destiny with the supreme commander.
					
					 The reporter referred to the successes and experience gained by the security organs at all levels in the past and their future tasks.
					
					 The report was followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers renewed their resolution to firmly establish the supreme commander's unitary army leadership system in the KPA security organ and creditably fulfill their mission and duty in the sacred struggle to defend the party and the leader, ideology and system of the country and the army of the revolution, bearing deep in mind the historic letter sent by him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Participants in Meeting of Security Personnel of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Participants in Meeting of Security Personnel of KPA
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and  first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo taken with the participants in the 2nd meeting of security personnel of the KPA.
					 Kim Jong Un acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the participants and extended a warm salute to them.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats the security personnel have performed by devoting themselves to protecting the party and the revolution and the country and its people whether they are known or not and they are praised or not, cherishing the trust of the party as the high honor and happiness in their lives.
					
					 He noted that the meeting provided a new landmark in increasing the militant function and role of the security organ of the KPA. He congratulated them on holding the successful meeting and had a photo taken with them.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol and Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by State Merited Chorus with Security Personnel of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by State Merited Chorus with Security Personnel of KPA
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the State Merited Chorus to congratulate the participants in the 2nd meeting of security personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Supreme Commander of the KPA Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, enjoyed the performance together with the participants in the meeting.
					
					 Put on the stage were male duet and chorus "Always under Party Flag", female solo "Song of Defender", male chorus "Let's Defend Socialism", etc.
					
					 Performers sang high praises of the outstanding and experienced leadership and matchless courage and grit of Kim Jong Un who has exalted the dignity and honor of the great Paektusan nation while building on this land a thriving socialist nation envied by the whole  world. 
					
					 They strikingly demonstrated through their presentation the truth that it is the fixed faith and an iron will  of all service personnel and people of the DPRK to unite ever closer around Kim Jong Un and always share destiny with him.
					
					 As the performance was over, he waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful performance, 
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol and Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: DPRK to Set Up Special Economic Zone in Sinuiju
articles.content:
DPRK to Set Up Special Economic Zone in Sinuiju
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK decided to set up a special economic zone in some part of Sinuiju, North Phyongan Province.
					 The sovereignty of the DPRK will be exercised in the zone.
					
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was released on Thursday.

articles.title: Provincial Economic Development Zones to Be Set Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Provincial Economic Development Zones to Be Set Up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is to set up economic development zones in provinces.
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was released Thursday.
					
					 According to the decree, some part of Ojok-ri, Uiju County, North Phyongan Province will come under the jurisdiction of Ryongun-ri. Ryongun-ri will belong to Sinuiju and be called North Phyongan Provincial Amnokgang economic development zone.
					
					 Jagang Provincial Manpho economic development zone will be established in some areas of Mitha-ri (including Poldung Islet) and Phosang-ri, Manpho City, Jagang Province and Jagang Provincial Wiwon industrial development zone will be set up in areas covering part of Tokam-ri and part of Kosong-ri, Wiwon County.
					
					 North Hwanghae Provincial Sinphyong tourist development zone will appear in some areas of Phyonghwa-ri, Sinphyong County, North Hwanghae Province and North Hwanghae Provincial Songrim export processing zone will be set up in some areas of Sosong-ri, Songrim City.
					
					 Kangwon Provincial Hyondong industrial development zone will be set up in some areas of Hyondong-ri, Wonsan City, Kangwon Province.
					
					 South Hamgyong Provincial Hungnam industrial development zone will take its shape in some areas in Haean District, Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province and South Hamgyong Provincial Pukchong agricultural development zone will be created in areas covering part of Mundong-ri, Pudong-ri and Jongsan-ri of Pukchong County.
					
					 North Hamgyong Provincial Chongjin economic development zone will be set up in areas covering part of Wolpho-ri, Susong-dong and Namsok-ri, Songphyong District, Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province. North Hamgyong Provincial Orang agricultural development zone will appear in some areas of Ryongjon-ri, Orang County. North Hamgyong Provincial Onsong island tourist development zone will be formed in some areas of Onsong township, Onsong County.
					
					 Ryanggang Provincial Hyesan economic development zone will appear in some areas of Sinjang-ri, Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province.
					
					 Some areas of Ryongnam-ri, Waudo District, Nampho City will turn into Nampho City Waudo export processing zone.
					
					 The sovereignty of the DPRK will be exercised in the provincial economic development zones.

articles.title: CPRK Slams S. Korean Chief Executive's "Policy Speech"
articles.content:
CPRK Slams S. Korean Chief Executive's "Policy Speech"
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, referring to domestic economic issue in her first "policy speech" at the puppet National Assembly on Nov. 18, praised herself but kept silence about the Intelligence Services' interference in the election, issue of focus in south Korea.
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that she impudently pulled up the DPRK again, raising a hue and cry over the "provocation" and "nuclear issue" and crying out for "principle" and "change".
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in information bulletin No. 1052 said:
					
					 Park's "policy speech" is a charade to deflect the public attention from the catastrophic situation of south Korea, pass the buck for the deteriorated inter-Korean relations to others and tide over the crisis. 
					
					 Park's "policy speech" was aimed to get rid of predicament at home and abroad but this touched off the greater anger of the public.
					
					 Despite the DPRK's repeated warnings, Park let loose a spate of provocative remarks pulling up the DPRK again, only to disclose her confrontational nature, lack of thinking power, stupidity and ignorance.
					
					 No one will believe her although she cries out for the "economic cooperation" and the like as she has firm confrontational conception.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive should think twice, seriously looking back on why there is increasing criticism of her at home and abroad.

articles.title: Delegation of Maritime Administration of DPRK Leaves for Britain
articles.content:
Delegation of Maritime Administration of DPRK Leaves for Britain
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Maritime Administration of the DPRK led by Director Ko Nung Du left here Thursday to attend the 28th Assembly of the International Maritime Organization to be held in London.

articles.title: DWUK Delegation Returns
articles.content:
DWUK Delegation Returns
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) headed by Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of the Central Committee of the DWUK, returned home by air on Thursday after taking part in a meeting of the Secretariat of the Women's International Democratic Federation and an international seminar in Brazil.

articles.title: International Meeting for Peace and Stability on Korean Peninsula Held in Potsdam
articles.content:
International Meeting for Peace and Stability on Korean Peninsula Held in Potsdam
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The international meeting for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula was held in Potsdam, Germany from Nov. 11 to 14.
					 Present there were Koreans in the north and the south and abroad and academic and press men of foreign countries.
					
					 Present there on invitation was the DPRK ambassador to Germany.
					
					 An opening address was made to be followed by congratulatory speeches.
					
					 Koreans from the north and the south and abroad made speeches on the themes of the historical study of Korea's division and armistice and the principle and prospect for their solution.
					
					 Speakers said that Korea was divided into two parts because the U.S. occupied the half of the Korean Peninsula at will, faked up the "separate government" and resorted to the vicious moves to make "two Koreas" in the subsequent period.
					
					 The U.S. has violated the Armistice Agreement, stepped up arms buildup and staged war maneuvers for aggression and, therefore, the danger of a war has increased on the Korean Peninsula, they said. They analyzed the ceaselessly deteriorating inter-Korean relations.
					
					 In order to remove the political and military confrontation, contradiction and nuclear stand-off on the peninsula, it is necessary to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty, they said.
					
					 Foreigners also spoke at the meeting.
					
					 In order to achieve peace on the peninsula it is imperative to lay bare the sinister ploy of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities, have the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea and arouse the world people to turn out in the anti-U.S. struggle, they said.
					
					 They expressed full support to the DPRK in its positive struggle for national reunification and peace on the peninsula under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They stressed that the peaceful reunification of Korea should be achieved without fail according to the reunification proposal advanced by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The participants in the meeting watched Korean film "Provoker of Korean War".
					
					 During the meeting the foreign participants inaugurated the international committee for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The participants held a press conference as regards the meeting.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Kuwaiti Personage
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Kuwaiti Personage
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the general manager of the Alamiah Building Co. of Kuwait.
					 Its General Manager Fathi Hakim handed the gift to a DPRK official concerned working in Kuwait on November 13.
					
					 The general manager said that he decided to present the gift to Marshal Kim Jong Un with deep respect, greatly attracted by him who leads the U.S. imperialists by the nose in the eyes of the world with his iron-willed pluck, grit and invincible will.
					
					 He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un greater success in his noble work for building a rich and powerful DPRK.

articles.title: National Exhibition and Sci-tech Presentation Held
articles.content:
National Exhibition and Sci-tech Presentation Held
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The National Exhibition and Sci-tech Presentation of Electric Lighting Decoration and Apparatus took place at Kim Chaek University of Technology on November 19 and 20 under the auspices of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers and officials of production units and science and education institutions in the field of illumination engineering.
					
					 Displayed there were various kinds of luminous source and voltage regulators including over 110 kinds of more than 400 LED lamps presented by Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang Lighting Appliances Factory, etc.
					
					 Scores of papers were made public there.
					
					 Participants exchanged successes and experiences which were gained in putting the production processes of lighting apparatus on a scientific and modern basis and in solving the scientific and technological problems arising in the project for the decoration of the cities, monumental edifices and leisure centers of the people at night with lamplights.
					
					 Papers including the illumination designing of LED digital signal apparatus presented by Kim Chaek University of Technology were highly appreciated as they are of great significance in practice.
					
					 Different exhibits aroused interest of the participants.
					
					 Among them are LED floodlights, LED lamps and large-sized LED electric boards.

articles.title: Nutrient Drinks for Sportspersons Appreciated in DPRK
articles.content:
Nutrient Drinks for Sportspersons Appreciated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Different kinds of nutrient drinks for promoting the recovery of sportspersons from fatigue are drawing attention from visitors at the on-going national exhibition of sci-tech achievements in sports at the Ice Rink here.
					 Among them are Jonghyang nutritive powder and fermented drinks processed with more than 10 kinds of compound lactobacilli, which are helpful to improving digestive organs and promoting recovery from fatigue.
					
					 Also on display at the exhibition is a tonic containing varieties of organic acids, monosaccharides and microelements. The tonic is effective for the recovery from fatigue and the treatment of liver and inflammatory diseases. It, a gold prize winner at the China International Expo held in September 2008, is made of extracts from natural herbs with strong antioxidants and its DPPH (diphenyl picrylhydrazine) 5.5 times higher than that of dried extract from ginkgo leaf.
					
					 An instant tea is one of those exhibits catching visitors' eyes. Included in the tea are electrolytes such as invert sugar, citric acid and salt. The tea produced through secondary and tertiary processing for easy absorption enables sportspersons to appease thirst and recover from fatigue within a few minutes. 
					
					 In this regard, Kim Myong Su, a department director of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, told KCNA:
					
					 Displayed at this exhibition are some kinds of homemade drinks which match with those of other countries known to be good for sportspersons.
					
					 In recent years DPRK sportspersons have made good records at international and domestic games, including marathon, football, judo and wrestling. They have taken those drinks.
					
					 Other kinds of drinks rich in natural vitamins and minerals are also gaining popularity among sportspersons.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime of Acting Nuclear War Servant of Foreign Forces
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime of Acting Nuclear War Servant of Foreign Forces
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The danger of a nuclear war created by outside forces on the Korean Peninsula has reached its height under the Park Geun Hye regime. 
					 The puppet regime adopted together with the U.S. a "tailored deterrence strategy" aiming at a preemptive strike at fellow countrymen in the north by mobilizing the nuclear force in the U.S. mainland and is fully involved in the U.S. establishment of the missile defense system. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers worked out a new "joint plan for coping with the provocation of a local war" designed to escalate a local war in the West Sea into a total war to be participated in by U.S. forces and are crying out for "striking at the  base of provocation and supporting and commanding forces" in the north. 
					
					 The nuclear-powered carriers Nimitz and George Washington, nuclear-powered submarine Cheyenne, B-52 strategic bombers, B-2 stealth strategic bombers, F-22 stealth fighters and other latest nuclear war means and strike weapons of the U.S. are more frequently operating in south Korea and its vicinity for nuclear war drills. 
					
					 The whole of south Korea has turned into a U.S. nuclear war drill ground and a huge site for testing its nukes.
					
					 This being a hard reality, Park Geun Hye became vocal decrying the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence not only at home but in every country she visited. This clearly indicates her sinister intention to pursue her confrontation policy toward fellow countrymen in the north to the last during her office. 
					
					 Before taking office she cried out for the DPRK's dismantlement of nukes. After her seizure of power, she blustered that the "north's access to nukes should not be recognized," jabbering that "it can never succeed" in its line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. 
					
					 She is shouting herself hoarse for eliminating the treasured sword for self-defence which guarantees the peace and security of the nation, trumpeting that "confidence-building process" is aimed at "disallowing the north's nukes and making it pay for any provocation to be perpetrated by it". 
					
					 A sinister aim sought by Park and her group in crying out for the DPRK's dismantlement of its nukes and the like is to disarm it at any cost and achieve their goal of aggression in collusion with outsiders. 
					
					 The present north-south relations and the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula are attributable to the moves of the U.S.  to "bring down the social system" in the DPRK and force it to dismantle its nuclear weapons and "the north policy" of its faithful lackeys, the Park Geun Hye group, and its hysteria for a war of aggression against the north.
					
					  It is a thrice-cursed act of treachery to work hard to force the DPRK to dismantle its nukes built by it to protect the country and the nation from a nuclear war of the aggressors. 
					
					 The Park group should immediately stop escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen, backing the U.S. in its moves for a nuclear war.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet chief executive in a message she sent to the "security dialogue" held in Seoul recently made a spate of vituperation that "the north's nuclear issue is an urgent task for regional peace and stability". When meeting foreigners she begged for the anti-DPRK cooperation while talking about "disallowing the north's possession of nukes". 
					 Minju Joson Thursday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This despicable act aimed to realize the anti-DPRK cooperation by relying on foreign forces under the pretext of the "north's nuclear issue" is an undisguised provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 If she is concerned about solving the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula, she should have urged the U.S., engaged in posing nuclear threat and making blackmail against the DPRK, to withdraw its forces and nuclear weapons from south Korea and drop the hostile policy toward the DPRK including nuclear war drills.
					
					 It is nothing but rigmarole of psychopathic patient obsessed with the confrontation with compatriots to find fault with the DPRK's nuclear weapons, means for defending the dignity of the nation and preventing the nuclear threat from outside forces, far from protesting the U.S., the chief criminal who caused the nuclear issue on the peninsula.
					
					 It is strange that the chief executive talks about the "north's nuclear issue" in utter disregard of the complicated south Korean political situation.
					
					 This goes to clearly prove the confrontational maniacs' sinister intention to find a way out in standing against the DPRK to the last.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive seeks to force the DPRK to disarm itself and realize with ease her ambition for aggression.
					
					 The puppet group should clearly understand the will of the service personnel and the people of the DPRK and behave with discretion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes Treacherous Nature, Danger of S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Adhering to Principle"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes Treacherous Nature, Danger of S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Adhering to Principle"
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- "The theory of adhering to principle" touted by the south Korean puppet regime is treacherous and anti-reunification sophism fundamentally denying the reunification-oriented nature of the north-south relations and a criminal logic seeking division and confrontation between the north and the south, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 The above-said theory totally denies the idea of "By our nation itself". This is evidenced by the essential content of the theory which calls for building a "new frame of south-north relations" of neither being led by the north nor making any concession, the article notes, and goes on:.
					
					 The gravity of the theory lies in that it aims to realize the ambition for "unification of social systems" and "unification through absorption" by making the inter-Korean relations playthings of foreign forces and the issue of international dispute and intensifying the cooperation in escalating confrontation with the DPRK. In fact, the theory of "relations between normal states consistent with international standard" touted by the south Korean puppet group while crying out for "adhering to principle" is nothing but a replica of the criminal theory of "two Koreas" and "theory of permanent division" advocated by the "yusin" dictator who met a disgraceful end while seeking "unification by prevailing over communism". He talked about "confrontation accompanied with dialogue" and "contest of social systems" under a scenario for division worked out by his U.S. master.
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces are making political and military provocations against the DPRK while eulogizing their policy for confrontation. They try to give impression that the "theory of adhering to principle" is something new. This is the last-ditch efforts to tide over their serious ruling crisis through cooperation with foreign forces.
					
					 But the anachronistic and criminal "theory of adhering to principle" touted by the puppet group deepening distrust between the north and the south, escalating confrontation between them and blocking the way of independent reunification, peace and prosperity can never be tolerated.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Telling Lies
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Telling Lies 
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- An editor of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., made public an article on Nov. 18 denouncing the south Korean puppet chief executive for telling lies.
					 The article recalled that Park Geun Hye again let loose a string of deceptive remarks.
					
					 In her "policy address" made that day as regards the draft budget for next year Park declared she would "root out inveterate scandals in all sectors, it said, adding it is only the  staff of the Secretaries Office of Chongwadae and their followers who will believe in her remarks.
					
					 Worse still, she took issue with the north in her "policy address", a revelation of her ignorance and intention to conceal her true colors with lies, it said.
					
					 Her deceptive remarks can convince no one, it noted, and went on:
					
					 She should frankly admit the illegal "presidential election" and step down, first of all.
					
					 She should apologize for the suppression of the forces desirous of independence, democracy and reunification and make an apology for the crimes committed by the Park Chung-Hee regime in the era of the "yusin" dictatorship and step down.
					
					 If she persists in what she has done for the past 9 months, she will not be able to escape a judgment by history.

articles.title: GI Commits Crime in S. Korea
articles.content:
GI Commits Crime in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A service member of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces committed a crime in Kyonggi Province, south Korea on Nov. 17, sparking off uproar.
					 That day a drunken GI stationed in Tongduchon drove a car on a road in Uijongbu at night and ran against a car of a south Korean inhabitant.
					
					 When the inhabitant protested, the GI pushed him and took to flight by madly driving the car. This shameless GI drove the car in the direction of Yangju at breakneck speed in a bid to throw the police car off the track but ran against another car coming from the opposite direction. Three GIs were in the car when he was caught red-handed.
					
					 GIs crimes in south Korea will never end as long as the puppet group persists in sycophancy towards the U.S.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Irresponsible Remarks Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Irresponsible Remarks Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea unanimously censured Park Geun Hye's "policy speech" at the "National Assembly" on Monday as irresponsible remarks. 
					 That day Lawmakers from the Democratic Party said that the chief executive made a long speech but there was nothing worth hearing and she did not make any mention about the dictatorship she has pursued after coming to power. 
					
					 In particular, she failed to make even the slightest expression of regret as the person responsible for driving the political situation into chaos through illegal acts of power bodies including the Intelligence Service and is shifting all the responsibilities upon the political camp, they said. 
					
					 They urged the chief executive to probe the truth behind the interference of the power bodies in the election, to begin with. 
					
					 A group of lawmakers from the Unified Progressive Party declared that "the president's policy speech is, in a word, nothing but confirmation of the worst era characterized by lack of understanding". 
					
					 She made no answers to the questions put by the people, the group said, adding that the speech was so poor that it made people angry as her less than one-year-old regime is beset with the problem of illegal election. 
					
					 The group declared that it would thoroughly probe the truth behind the interference in the election by power bodies.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Lawmakers Rap Chief Executive for Telling Lies
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Lawmakers Rap Chief Executive for Telling Lies 
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Lawmakers from the south Korean opposition Democratic Party on Nov. 18 accused the puppet chief executive of telling lies.
					 In her "policy address" at the "National Assembly" that day the chief executive said that she submitted a bill on essentials of the people's living to bring them well-being. In this regard lawmakers from the Democratic Party belonging to the Health and Wellbeing Committee of the "National Assembly" said that there is no single bill related to essentials of the people's living submitted by the regime till now according to what has been confirmed.
					
					 They expressed surprise at Chongwadae and the chief executive's poor understanding of business and situation.
					
					 We cannot overlook the chief executive openly telling such lie, they charged.

articles.title: Chongryon Condemns Park Geun Hye's Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
Chongryon Condemns Park Geun Hye's Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification issued a statement on Monday accusing the Park Geun Hye regime of its anachronistic moves for reviving the "yusin" dictatorship.
					 The statement said that the "yusin" dictatorship that disappeared 30 years ago in south Korea is being revived amid the ruthless crackdown upon the progressive and democratic forces under the pretext of security.
					
					 It goes without saying that such situation is resulted from the scheme of the present ruler who claimed entering the political world to "restore her father's honor as politician", it noted.
					
					 If Park Geun Hye persistently clings to her foolish moves for reviving the "yusin" dictatorship while swimming against the trend of history, she can not escape from the same miserable fate as what was met by dictator Park Chung-Hee, the statement warned.
					
					 It stressed that Koreans in Japan will stand by compatriots in south Korea who are shaking the conservative reactionary forces' rule down to the very foundation and continue advancing to reunify the country independently by the Korean nation itself.
					
					 Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) including Pak Tong Ho, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, and Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, in their statements condemned Park Geun Hye for moving to revive the "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: Korean National Food Kimchi Introduced by ITAR-TASS
articles.content:
Korean National Food Kimchi Introduced by ITAR-TASS
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The Russian ITAR-TASS news introduced Korean national food Kimchi on November 15.
					 The news said as follows:
					
					 In Korea Kimchi rich in vitamin is well known as panacea.
					
					 Kimchi is a peculiar food made of pickled cabbage.
					
					 It raises people's immunity and successfully prevents different diseases including pneumonia and bird flu.
					
					 Kimchi which is always seen on the table of Koreans contains vitamins, essential amino acid and minerals.
					
					 It is the season for making Kimchi now.
					
					 In the DPRK Kimchi is made by the industrial method, too.
					
					 But most of Koreans prefer Kimchi made at home nice to their own palate to those made at the factory.
					
					 Kimchi is also popular in other countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mexico
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A Mexican national committee for remembering General Secretary Kim Jong Il was formed on November 15.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, was elected chairman of the national committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting, seminar and lecture on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of the demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Poland
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A Polish committee for remembering General Secretary Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Warsaw on November 15.
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to introduce the revolutionary life and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Segunda conferencia de funcionarios de seguridad del EPC
articles.content:
Segunda conferencia de funcionarios de seguridad del EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la segunda conferencia de los funcionarios de seguridad del Ejercito Popular de Corea con la participacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					　En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol y otros miembros de mando de los organos de las fuerzas armadas, los comisarios de tipo de ejercito y cuerpos y los funcionarios de seguridad de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas, el ejercito de cohetes estrategicos y las academias a todos niveles y otras instituciones de las fuerzas armadas del EPC.
					
					　El lugar de conferencia estaba lleno de de la veneracion y el sentimiento de agradecimiento al Comandante Supremo quien hizo convocar la conferencia prestando profunda atencion a la labor de seguridad del EPC y envio a los participantes el mensaje "Para mejorar e intensificar la labor de seguridad del ejercito popular conforme a la demanda del periodo de viraje historico del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche".
					
					　El vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC Jo Kyong Chol pronuncio discurso de apertura y presento el informe, respectivamente.
					
					　El informante senalo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung preparo en medio de la lucha armada antijaponesa la autoctona idea de seguridad del ejercito y la preciosa tradicion, fundo en el primer periodo de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares y modernas despues de la liberacion de la patria el organo de seguridad del EPC y en cada periodo y etapa de la revolucion ilumino el camino a seguir por este  organo y dirigio sabiamente sus labores.
					
					　Subrayo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il convoco en octubre de 1993 por primer vez de la historia de la fundacion del ejercito la conferencia de los funcionarios de seguridad, ocasion en la cual les envio el historico mensaje ofreciendoles el invicto remedio omnipotente y dirigio la labor de seguridad del EPC para que se realizara segun la idea y la demanda del partido.
					
					　Enfatizo que la autoctona idea de seguridad del ejercito de los Generalisimos y sus hazanas se heredan y se desarrollan con brillantez en una nueva etapa mas alta bajo la sabia direccion  del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un.
					
					　Agrego que bajo la confianza y el amor del Comandante Supremo el organo de seguridad del EPC se ha fortalecido como unidad nuclear que  asegura perfectamente y en cualquier momento y lugar la seguridad de la Direccion de la Revolucion heredando la tradicion de la defensa a ultranza al lider.
					
					　Dijo que los funcionarios de este organo se han formado como fuertes en la idea y la conviccion quienes marchan por el camino indicado por el partido y como soldados revolucionarios del Songun que comparten el proposito, el aliento y el destino con el Comandante Supremo.
					
					El informante se refirio a los exitos y las experiencias logrados en el pasado por los organos de seguridad a todos los niveles y presento las tareas a ser cumplidas en el futuro.
					
					Hubo las intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores juraron establecer cabalmente en el organo de seguridad del EPC el sistema de direccion unica del Comandante Supremo sobre el ejercito guardando profundamente el historico mensaje enviado por este y cumplir con excelencia la mision y el deber asumidos ante ellos mismos en la sagrada lucha por defender el partido y al lider, la idea y el regimen y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en conferencia de funcionarios de seguridad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en conferencia de funcionarios de seguridad
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto con los participantes en la segunda conferencia de los funcionarios de seguridad del EPC.
					El Mariscal respondio cordialmente a las efusivas aclamaciones de los participantes.
					
					Evaluo altamente las proezas de los funcionarios de seguridad quienes dedican toda la vida a defender el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo guardando siempre la confianza del partido como digna gloria y felicidad de la vida.
					
					Senalando que a traves de la reunion se aseguro el nuevo jalon para elevar la combativa funcion y papel del organo de seguridad del EPC, el Mariscal felicito a los participantes quienes realizaron con exito la conferencia y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol y Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Coro Estatal Benemerito junto con participantes en conferencia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Coro Estatal Benemerito junto con participantes en conferencia
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito para felicitar a los participantes en la segunda conferencia de los funcionarios de seguridad del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC, la presencio junto con los participantes en la conferencia.
					
					En la escena se pusieron el duo y coro masculinos "Siempre con la bandera del partido", el solo femenino "Cancion de defensores", el coro masculino "Defendamos el socialismo" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron la destacada y probada direccion, la incomparable audacia e impetu del Comandante Supremo quien construye en esta tierra un Estado prospero socialista admirado por todo el mundo y ostenta la dignidad y el honor de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Patentizaron que compartir siempre el destino con el Comandante Supremo uniendose con firmeza en torno a el es la invariable conviccion guardada en el corazon de todo el ejercito y pueblo coreanos y la firme voluntad indoblegable con nada.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Mariscal felicito el exito de funcion respondiendo a las efusivas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol y Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX denuncia "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX denuncia "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que se aprobo en el 3o comite del 68o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 20 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Las fuerzas hostiles que consideran la RPDC como espina en los ojos aprobaron forzosamente este ano tambien la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC inventada con los datos falsificados de toda indole.
					
					Esta campana de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites es el climax de la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero en el trato de DDHH, razon por la cual la RPDC la rechaza categoricamente como antes.
					
					La "resolucion de DDHH", aprobada por los que seducidos por el veto y la hostilidad al regimen socialista al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares, dan espaldas a la realidad animada por la politica del amor al pueblo y convierten lo negro en lo blanco, no tiene nada que ver con la defensa de DDHH, sino agravara la confrontacion y la desconfianza.
					
					No evitara la severa sentencia de la historia el absurdo intento de las fuerzas hostiles de violar la soberania de la RPDC y atentar el digno regimen socialista abusando de DDHH  en el malsano proposito politico.
					
					Con el poderio de la unidad monolitica, la RPDC frustrara tajantemente los desafios y las maquinaciones intrigantes de toda indole de las fuerzas hostiles y construira ostentosamente un Estado prospero socialista donde el pueblo viva felizmente.

articles.title: Decreto de APS de crear en Sinuiju parque especial economico
articles.content:
Decreto de APS de crear en Sinuiju parque especial economico
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- De acuerdo con el decreto fechado 21 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en alguna zona de la ciudad de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte se creara el parque especial economico.
					Segun ello, en el dicho parque se ejercera la soberania de la RPDC.

articles.title: Secretariado de CRPP critica "discurso sobre politica gubernamental" de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Secretariado de CRPP critica "discurso sobre politica gubernamental" de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El dia 18, la mandataria del Sur de Corea Park Geun-hye pronuncio el primer "discurso sobre la politica administrativa" despues de su toma de posesion. En la ocasion, al hablar difusamente de los asuntos economicos del interior y exterior, Park elogio asquerosamente a si misma, pero no se refirio nada al caso de la intervencion del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia en las pasadas elecciones y otros que son focos en el Sur de Corea.
					Sobre todo, ella ofendio atrevidamente otra vez la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusandola de "provocacion" y "problema nuclear" y hablando del "principio" y el  "cambio".
					
					Al respecto, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 21 una informacion no.1052 que senala en particular:
					
					El presente discurso es una farsa para enganar la opinion publica a fin de evadir las responsabilidades del estado catastrofico del Sur de Corea y del empeoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y salir de la crisis.
					
					Para liberarse de aprietos sin salida, Park pronuncio el "discurso sobre la politica gubernamental" en la Asamblea Nacional, pero esto exploto la indignacion de la poblacion surcoreana. 
					
					Pese a la reiterada advertencia de la RPDC, ella volvio a soltar como papagayo la sofisteria provocativa anti-RPDC, demostrando asi su temperamento conflictivo, su escasez de pensamiento y su ignorancia. 
					
					Aunque ella habla tanto de la "cooperacion economica" con la arraigada concepcion de enfrentamiento, nadie reconoce su sinceridad. 
					
					La mandataria surcoreana debe reflexionar seriamente por que se alzan tanto en el interior como en el exterior las voces de criticas y denuncias a si misma.
